column5: My son and his GF headed out on Cliff Lake yesterday and had a very good day of Lake Trout action.Weather is pretty mild up here and can fish outside of the ice hut but they brought there's along to warm up in if needed.Had good action on white tunes and plain jig and minnow in 50 ft with fish cruising around the 30 ft mark.They kept one for a meal and released the other 8.Was able to get out on the ATV.
Nice pictures n great weather,good recipe for some fun!
Great! Good to keep up on the happenings! Bill
